00015 HaloProperties::HaloProperties( real *pPos, real *pVel, real *pMass, unsigned nPart, real zsnap ) {
00016   m_pPos = pPos;
00017   m_pVel = pVel;
00018   m_nPart = nPart;
00019   m_pMass = pMass;
00020   m_Cosm.OmegaM0 = 0.25;
00021   m_Cosm.OmegaL0 = 0.75;
00022   m_Cosm.H0 = 0.1;
00023   m_Cosm.G = 43011.7902;
00024   m_Cosm.asnap = 1.0 / ( 1.0 + zsnap );
00025 
00026   m_imostbound = -1;
00027 
00028   for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00029     m_xcm[ j ] = 0.0;
00030     m_xmb[ j ] = 0.0;
00031     m_vcm[ j ] = 0.0;
00032     m_vmb[ j ] = 0.0;
00033   }
00034   m_mtot = 0.0;
00035   for( unsigned i=0; i < m_nPart; ++i)
00036     m_mtot += m_pMass[i];
00037 }

00058 real 
00059 HaloProperties::ComputeTotalMassExc( std::vector<bool> excluded ) {

00061   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i )
00062     if ( !excluded.at( i ) )

00066 
00067 void 
00068 HaloProperties::ComputeCM( real Boxlength, Vector3& xcm ) {
00069   xcm = 0.0;
00070 
00071   real rfirst[ 3 ];
00072   for(unsigned j=0; j<3; ++j)
00073     rfirst[ j ] = m_pPos[ j ];
00074 
00075   real BL05 = Boxlength / 2.0;
00076   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3=0; i < m_nPart; ++i, i3=3*i ) {
00077     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00078       real dr = m_pPos[ i3 + j ] - rfirst[ j ];
00079       if ( dr >= BL05 )
00080     dr -= Boxlength;
00081       else if ( dr < -BL05 )
00082     dr += Boxlength;
00083       xcm( j ) += dr * m_pMass[ i ];
00084     }
00085   }
00086   assert( m_mtot > 0.0 );
00087   for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j )
00088     xcm( j ) = fmod( xcm( j ) / m_mtot + rfirst[ j ], Boxlength );
00089 }

00092 void 
00093 HaloProperties::ComputeCMExc( real Boxlength, Vector3& xcm, std::vector<bool> excluded ) {
00094   xcm = 0.0;
00095 
00096   real rfirst[ 3 ];
00097   for(unsigned j=0; j<3; ++j)
00098     rfirst[ j ] = m_pPos[ j ];
00099 
00100   real BL05 = Boxlength / 2.0;
00101   real mtotexc = 0.0;
00102   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3=0; i < m_nPart; ++i, i3=3*i ) {
00103     if ( excluded.at( i ) )
00104       continue;
00105     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00106       real dr = m_pPos[ i3 + j ] - rfirst[ j ];
00107       if ( dr >= BL05 )
00108     dr -= Boxlength;
00109       else if ( dr < -BL05 )
00110     dr += Boxlength;
00111       xcm( j ) += dr * m_pMass[ i ];
00112     }
00113     mtotexc += m_pMass[ i ];
00114   }
00115   for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j )
00116     xcm( j ) = fmod(xcm( j ) / mtotexc + rfirst[ j ], Boxlength);
00117 }

00124 void 
00125 HaloProperties::CenterOnCM( real Boxlength ) {
00126   m_xcm[ 0 ] = 0.0; m_xcm[ 1 ] = 0.0; m_xcm[ 2 ] = 0.0;
00127 
00128   real rfirst[ 3 ];
00129   rfirst[ 0 ] = m_pPos[ 0 ]; rfirst[ 1 ] = m_pPos[ 1 ]; rfirst[ 2 ] = m_pPos[ 2 ];
00130 
00131   real BL05 = Boxlength / 2.0;
00132   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i ) {
00133     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00134       real dr = m_pPos[ 3 * i + j ] - rfirst[ j ];
00135       if ( dr >= BL05 )
00136     dr -= Boxlength;
00137       else if ( dr < -BL05 )
00138     dr += Boxlength;
00139       m_xcm[ j ] += dr * m_pMass[ i ];
00140     }
00141   }
00142   for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j )
00143     m_xcm[ j ] = fmod( m_xcm[ j ] / m_mtot + rfirst[ j ], Boxlength );
00144 
00145   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3 = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i, i3 = 3 * i ) {
00146     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00147       m_pPos[ i3 + j ] -= m_xcm[ j ];
00148 
00149       if ( m_pPos[ i3 + j ] >= BL05 )
00150     m_pPos[ i3 + j ] -= Boxlength;
00151       else if ( m_pPos[ i3 + j ] < -BL05 )
00152     m_pPos[ i3 + j ] += Boxlength;
00153     }
00154   }
00155 }
00156 void 
00157 HaloProperties::CenterOnCMExc( real Boxlength, std::vector<bool> excluded ) {
00158   real rfirst[ 3 ];
00159   for(unsigned j=0; j<3; ++j){
00160     m_xcm[ j ] = 0.0;
00161     rfirst[ j ] = m_pPos[ j ];
00162   }
00163 
00164   real BL05 = Boxlength / 2.0;
00165   real mtotexc = 0.0;
00166   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i ) {
00167     if ( excluded.at( i ) )
00168       continue;
00169     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00170       real dr = m_pPos[ 3 * i + j ] - rfirst[ j ];
00171       if ( dr >= BL05 )
00172     dr -= Boxlength;
00173       else if ( dr < -BL05 )
00174     dr += Boxlength;
00175       m_xcm[ j ] += dr * m_pMass[ i ];
00176     }
00177     mtotexc += m_pMass[ i ];
00178   }
00179   for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j )
00180     m_xcm[ j ] = fmod( m_xcm[ j ] / mtotexc + rfirst[ j ], Boxlength );
00181 
00182   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3 = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i, i3 = 3 * i ) {
00183     if ( excluded.at( i ) )
00184       continue;
00185     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00186       m_pPos[ i3 + j ] -= m_xcm[ j ];
00187 
00188       if ( m_pPos[ i3 + j ] >= BL05 )
00189     m_pPos[ i3 + j ] -= Boxlength;
00190       else if ( m_pPos[ i3 + j ] < -BL05 )
00191     m_pPos[ i3 + j ] += Boxlength;
00192     }
00193   }

00196 void 
00197 HaloProperties::ComputeMB( real Boxlength, Vector3& xmb ) {
00198   std::vector<real> kin;
00199   std::vector<real> pot;
00200   real totkin = 0.0;
00201   real totpot = 0.0;
00202 
00203   totkin = ComputeKineticEnergyNoHubble( kin );
00204 
00205   if ( m_nPart > FORCE_DIRECT_TREE_SPLIT )
00206     totpot = ComputePotentialTree( 0.75, 0.001, pot );
00207   else
00208     totpot = ComputePotentialDirect( 0.001, pot );
00209 
00210   real Emin = 1.0e+99; // big number, not less than maximum
00211   unsigned imostbound = 0;
00212 
00213   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i ) {
00214     if ( kin[ i ] + pot[ i ] < Emin ) {
00215       Emin = kin[ i ] + pot[ i ];
00216       imostbound = i;
00217     }
00218   }
00219 
00220   for(unsigned j=0; j<3; xmb( j ) = m_pPos[ 3 * imostbound + j ], ++j);
00221 }

00224 HaloProperties::ComputeMBExc(real Boxlength, Vector3& xmb, std::vector<bool> excluded ) {
00225 
00226   std::vector<real> kin, pot;
00227   real totkin = 0.0, totpot = 0.0;
00228 
00229   totkin = ComputeKineticEnergyNoHubble( kin );
00230 
00231   if ( m_nPart > FORCE_DIRECT_TREE_SPLIT )
00232     totpot = ComputePotentialTree( 0.75, 0.001, pot );
00233   else
00234     totpot = ComputePotentialDirect( 0.001, pot );
00235 
00236   real Emin = 1.0e+99; // big number, not less than maximum
00237   unsigned imostbound = 0;
00238 
00239   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i ) {
00240     if( excluded.at(i) )
00241       continue;
00242     if ( kin[ i ] + pot[ i ] < Emin ) {
00243       Emin = kin[ i ] + pot[ i ];
00244       imostbound = i;
00245     }
00246   }
00247 
00248   for(unsigned j=0; j<3; xmb( j ) = m_pPos[ 3 * imostbound + j ], ++j);
00249 }

00269 real 
00270 HaloProperties::CenterOnMB( real Boxlength, real &rmbcm, real &alpha ) {
00271   std::vector<real> kin, pot;
00272   real totkin = 0.0, totpot = 0.0;
00273 
00274   totkin = ComputeKineticEnergyNoHubble( kin );
00275 
00276   if ( m_nPart > FORCE_DIRECT_TREE_SPLIT )
00277     totpot = ComputePotentialTree( 0.75, 0.001, pot );
00278   else
00279     totpot = ComputePotentialDirect( 0.001, pot );
00280 
00281   real Emin = 1.0e+99;
00282   unsigned imostbound = 0;
00283 
00284   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i ) {
00285     if ( kin[ i ] + pot[ i ] < Emin ) {
00286       Emin = kin[ i ] + pot[ i ];
00287       imostbound = i;
00288     }
00289   }
00290 
00291   for(unsigned j=0; j<3; m_xmb[ j ] = m_pPos[ 3 * imostbound + j ], ++j);
00292 
00293   m_rmbcm = sqrt( m_xmb[ 0 ] * m_xmb[ 0 ]
00294           + m_xmb[ 1 ] * m_xmb[ 1 ]
00295           + m_xmb[ 2 ] * m_xmb[ 2 ] );
00296 
00297   m_alpha = 2.0 * totkin / totpot + 1.0;
00298 
00299   CenterOnCoord( m_xmb, Boxlength );
00300 
00301   m_imostbound = imostbound;
00302   alpha = m_alpha;
00303   rmbcm = m_rmbcm;
00304   return m_rmbcm;
00305 }

00313 void 
00314 HaloProperties::CenterOnCoord( real *xc, real Boxlength ) {
00315   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3 = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i, i3 = 3 * i )
00316     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j )
00317       m_pPos[ i3 + j ] = fmod( m_pPos[ i3 + j ] - xc[ j ], Boxlength );
00318 }

00324 void 
00325 HaloProperties::AverageVel( const unsigned n, const real eps ) {
00326   ANNpointArray     dataPts;
00327   ANNpoint      queryPt;
00328   ANNidxArray       nnIdx;
00329   ANNdistArray      dists;
00330   ANNkd_tree*       kdTree;
00331     
00332   queryPt = annAllocPt( 3 );
00333   dataPts = annAllocPts( m_nPart, 3 );
00334   nnIdx   = new ANNidx[n];
00335   dists   = new ANNdist[n];
00336     
00337   if( m_nPart <= n ){
00338     throw std::runtime_error( "in HaloProperties::AverageVel: number of points in averaging >= number of points available" );
00339   }
00340     
00341   std::vector<real> SPHrho(m_nPart,0.0);
00342   std::vector<real> SPHvel(3*m_nPart,0.0);
00343     
00344   for( unsigned i=0,i3=0; i<m_nPart; ++i,i3+=3 )
00345     for( unsigned j=0; j<3; ++j )
00346       (dataPts[i])[j] = m_pPos[i3+j];
00347     
00348   kdTree = new ANNkd_tree( dataPts, m_nPart, 3 );
00349     
00350   for( unsigned i=0,i3=0; i<m_nPart; ++i,i3+=3 ){
00351         
00352     for( unsigned j=0; j<3; ++j )
00353       queryPt[j] = m_pPos[i3+j];
00354         
00355     kdTree->annkSearch( queryPt, n, nnIdx, dists, eps );
00356         
00357     real h = sqrt(dists[n-1]);
00358 
00359     for( unsigned k=0; k<n; ++k ){
00360       dists[k] = sqrt(dists[k]);
00361       SPHrho[i] += m_pMass[nnIdx[k]]*SPHK3D( dists[k], (double)h );
00362     }
00363   }
00364     
00365   for( unsigned i=0,i3=0; i<m_nPart; ++i,i3+=3 ){
00366         
00367     for( unsigned j=0; j<3; ++j )
00368       queryPt[j] = m_pPos[i3+j];
00369         
00370     kdTree->annkSearch( queryPt, n, nnIdx, dists, eps );
00371 
00372     real h = sqrt(dists[n-1]);  
00373         
00374     for( unsigned k=0; k<n; ++k ){
00375       dists[k] = sqrt(dists[k]);
00376       for( unsigned j=0; j<3; ++j )
00377     SPHvel[i3+j] += m_pMass[nnIdx[k]]/SPHrho[nnIdx[k]]*m_pVel[3*nnIdx[k]+j]*SPHK3D( dists[k], (double)h );
00378     }
00379   }
00380     
00381   delete[] nnIdx;
00382   delete[] dists;
00383   delete kdTree;
00384     
00385   for( unsigned i=0,i3=0; i<m_nPart; ++i,i3+=3 ){
00386     for( unsigned j=0; j<3; ++j )
00387       m_pVel[i3+j] = SPHvel[i3+j];
00388   }
00389 }
00390 
00391 void 
00392 HaloProperties::ComputeCenterVel( Vector3& vcm ) {
00393   for(unsigned j=0; j<3; ++j)
00394     m_vcm[j]= 0.0;
00395 
00396   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3 = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i, i3 = 3 * i )
00397     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j )
00398       m_vcm[ j ] += m_pVel[ i3 + j ] * m_pMass[ i ];
00399 
00400   assert( m_mtot > 0.0 );
00401   for( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j){
00402     m_vcm[ j ] /= m_mtot;
00403     vcm(j)=m_vcm[j];
00404   }
00405 }
00406 
00407 void 
00408 HaloProperties::ComputeCenterVelExc( Vector3& vcm, std::vector<bool> excluded ) {
00409   real mtotexc = 0.0;
00410   vcm = 0.0;
00411 
00412   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3=0; i < m_nPart; ++i, i3=3*i ) {
00413     if ( excluded.at( i ) )
00414       continue;
00415     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00416       vcm( j ) += m_pVel[ i3 + j ] * m_pMass[ i ];
00417     }
00418     mtotexc += m_pMass[ i ];
00419   }
00420 
00421   if( ! mtotexc > 0.0 ) {
00422     vcm = 0.0;
00423     return;
00424   }
00425   vcm /= mtotexc;
00426 }
00427 
00428 void 
00429 HaloProperties::CenterVel( void ) {
00430   // set vcm to 0.0
00431   for(unsigned j=0; j<3; m_vcm[ j ] = 0.0, ++j);
00432     
00433   // add up velocities with weight given by mass
00434   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3 = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i, i3=3*i ) {
00435     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00436       m_vcm[ j ] += m_pVel[ i3 + j ] * m_pMass[ i ];
00437     }
00438   }
00439 
00440   // normalize velocity and subtract it from all other velocities
00441   assert( m_mtot > 0.0 );
00442   for(unsigned j=0; j<3; ++j){
00443     m_vcm[ j ] /= m_mtot;
00444     for ( unsigned i = 0, i3=0; i < m_nPart; m_pVel[ i3 + j ] -= m_vcm[ j ], ++i, i3=3*i );
00445   }
00446   // set vcm to 0.0
00447   for( unsigned j=0; j<3; m_vcm[ j ] = 0.0, ++j );
00448 }
00449 
00450 void 
00451 HaloProperties::CenterVelOn( real* vc ) {
00452   for( unsigned j=0; j<3; ++j){
00453     m_vcm[j]=0.0;
00454     for ( unsigned i = 0, i3 = 0; i < m_nPart; m_pVel[ i3 + j ] = m_pVel[ i3 + j ] - vc[ j ], ++i, i3 = 3 * i );
00455   }
00456 }
00457 
00458 void 
00459 HaloProperties::CenterVelExc( std::vector<bool> excluded ) {
00460   real mtotexc = 0.0;
00461   for(unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j)
00462     m_vcm[ j ] = 0.0;
00463 
00464   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i ) {
00465     if ( excluded.at( i ) )
00466       continue;
00467     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00468       m_vcm[ j ] += m_pVel[ 3 * i + j ] * m_pMass[ i ];
00469     }
00470     mtotexc += m_pMass[ i ];
00471   }
00472 
00473   assert( mtotexc > 0.0 );
00474   for(unsigned j=0; j<3; ++j){
00475     m_vcm[ j ] /= mtotexc;
00476     for ( unsigned i = 0, i3=0; i < m_nPart; ++i, i3=3*i )
00477       m_pVel[ i3 + j ] -= m_vcm[ j ];
00478   }
00479 }

00491 void 
00492 HaloProperties::ComputeAngularMomentum( real &Jtot ) {
00493   Jtot = 0.0;
00494   real r[ 3 ], v[ 3 ], J[ 3 ];
00495   //real Hza = m_Cosm.H0 * m_Cosm.asnap * sqrt( m_Cosm.OmegaM0 / ( m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap )+ m_Cosm.OmegaL0 );
00496   real sqrta = sqrt( m_Cosm.asnap );
00497   J[ 0 ] = J[ 1 ] = J[ 2 ] = 0.0;
00498   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i ) {
00499     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00500       v[ j ] = sqrta * m_pVel[ 3 * i + j ];// + Hza * m_pPos[ 3 * i + j ];
00501       r[ j ] = m_Cosm.asnap * m_pPos[ 3 * i + j ];
00502     }
00503 
00504     J[ 0 ] += ( r[ 1 ] * v[ 2 ] - r[ 2 ] * v[ 1 ] ) * m_pMass[ i ];
00505     J[ 1 ] += ( r[ 2 ] * v[ 0 ] - r[ 0 ] * v[ 2 ] ) * m_pMass[ i ];
00506     J[ 2 ] += ( r[ 0 ] * v[ 1 ] - r[ 1 ] * v[ 0 ] ) * m_pMass[ i ];
00507 
00508   }
00509   Jtot = sqrt( J[ 0 ] * J[ 0 ] + J[ 1 ] * J[ 1 ] + J[ 2 ] * J[ 2 ] );
00510 }
00511 
00516 real 
00517 HaloProperties::ComputeAngularMomentum( Vector3& J ) const {
00518   // real Jtot = 0.0;
00519   Vector3 r;
00520   Vector3 v;
00521   // real Hza = m_Cosm.H0 * m_Cosm.asnap * sqrt( m_Cosm.OmegaM0 / ( m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap ) + m_Cosm.OmegaL0 );
00522   real sqrta = sqrt( m_Cosm.asnap );
00523   J( 0 ) = J( 1 ) = J( 2 ) = 0.0;
00524   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i ) {
00525     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00526       v( j ) = sqrta * m_pVel[ 3 * i + j ];// + Hza * m_pPos[ 3 * i + j ]; //HubbleFlow
00527       r( j ) = m_Cosm.asnap * m_pPos[ 3 * i + j ];
00528     }
00529     J += (r^v) * m_pMass[i];
00530     // J( 0 ) += ( r[ 1 ] * v[ 2 ] - r[ 2 ] * v[ 1 ] ) * m_pMass[ i ];
00531     // J( 1 ) += ( r[ 2 ] * v[ 0 ] - r[ 0 ] * v[ 2 ] ) * m_pMass[ i ];
00532     // J( 2 ) += ( r[ 0 ] * v[ 1 ] - r[ 1 ] * v[ 0 ] ) * m_pMass[ i ];
00533 
00534   }
00535   //Jtot = sqrt( J( 0 ) * J( 0 ) + J( 1 ) * J( 1 ) + J( 2 ) * J( 2 ) );
00536 
00537   return real(J.norm());
00538 }

00545 void
00546 HaloProperties::ComputeVelocityDispersion( real& Sigma ){
00547   // either go on with norm of velocity vector
00548   // use method minimizing roundoff errors
00549   real a = 0;
00550   real q = 0;
00551   for(unsigned i = 0; i<m_nPart; ++i){
00552     real vx = m_pVel[3*i+0];
00553     real vy = m_pVel[3*i+1];
00554     real vz = m_pVel[3*i+2];
00555     real v2 = sqrt(vx*vx + vy*vy + vz*vz);
00556 
00557     q = q + (1.0*(i-1))/i*(v2-a);
00558     a = a + (v2-a)/i;
00559   }
00560   Sigma = sqrt(q/m_nPart);
00561 
00562   // or step through all euclidean components
00563   // or through (r,phi,theta) components
00564   // or use other definition of sigma
00565 }

00567 void 
00568 HaloProperties::GetSortedDistances( std::vector<Distance>& dvec ) const {
00569   dvec.clear();
00570 
00571   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3 = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i, i3 = 3*i ) {
00572     real ds2 = 0.0;
00573     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3 ;++j )
00574       ds2 += m_pPos[ i3 + j ] * m_pPos[ i3 + j ];
00575     dvec.push_back( Distance( sqrt( ds2 ), i ) );
00576   }
00577 
00578   std::sort( dvec.begin(), dvec.end() );
00579 }
00580 
00581 // Centering in position is required before calling ComputeMajorAxes.
00582 void 
00583 HaloProperties::ComputeMajorAxes( Vector3& Eigenvalues, std::vector<Vector3>& Eigenvectors ) const{
00584   Matrix33 I; I = 0.0;
00585   std::vector<real> d;
00586 
00587   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3 = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i, i3 = 3 * i ) {
00588 
00589     I( 0, 0 ) += m_pMass[i] * ( m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ] * m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ] + m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ] * m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ]);
00590     I( 0, 1 ) += m_pMass[i] * (-m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ] * m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ]);
00591     I( 0, 2 ) += m_pMass[i] * (-m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ] * m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ]);
00592 
00593     I( 1, 0 ) += m_pMass[i] * (-m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ] * m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ]);
00594     I( 1, 1 ) += m_pMass[i] * ( m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ] * m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ] + m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ] * m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ]);
00595     I( 1, 2 ) += m_pMass[i] * (-m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ] * m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ]);
00596 
00597     I( 2, 0 ) += m_pMass[i] * (-m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ] * m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ]);
00598     I( 2, 1 ) += m_pMass[i] * (-m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ] * m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ]);
00599     I( 2, 2 ) += m_pMass[i] * ( m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ] * m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ] + m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ] * m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ]);
00600   }
00601 
00602   I.Eigen( Eigenvalues, Eigenvectors );
00603 
00604   real la = Eigenvalues( 0 );
00605   real lb = Eigenvalues( 1 );
00606   real lc = Eigenvalues( 2 );
00607   if(m_nPart == 0)
00608     std::cerr << " No particles in halo! Axes not defined! Returning NaNs for Eigenvalues!" << std::endl;
00609   //assert(m_mtot>0.0);
00610   Eigenvalues( 0 ) = sqrt( 5.0 / ( 2.0 * m_mtot ) * ( -la + lb + lc ) );
00611   Eigenvalues( 1 ) = sqrt( 5.0 / ( 2.0 * m_mtot ) * ( + la - lb + lc ) );
00612   Eigenvalues( 2 ) = sqrt( 5.0 / ( 2.0 * m_mtot ) * ( + la + lb - lc ) );
00613 }
00614 
00615 
00616 
00617 void 
00618 HaloProperties::ComputeMajorAxesReduced( Vector3& Eigenvalues, std::vector<Vector3>& Eigenvectors ) const {
00619   Matrix33 I;
00620 
00621   I = 0.0;
00622   std::vector<real> d;
00623   real mtot = 0.0;
00624 
00625   for ( unsigned j = 0; j < m_nPart; ++j ) {
00626     mtot += m_pMass[j];
00627 
00628     real r2 = ( m_pPos[ 3 * j + 0 ] * m_pPos[ 3 * j + 0 ] + m_pPos[ 3 * j + 1 ] * m_pPos[ 3 * j + 1 ] + m_pPos[ 3 * j + 2 ] * m_pPos[ 3 * j + 2 ] );
00629 
00630     if ( j != m_imostbound ) {
00631       I( 0, 0 ) += m_pMass[j] * (  m_pPos[ 3 * j + 1 ] * m_pPos[ 3 * j + 1 ] + m_pPos[ 3 * j + 2 ] * m_pPos[ 3 * j + 2 ] ) / r2;
00632       I( 0, 1 ) += m_pMass[j] * ( -m_pPos[ 3 * j + 0 ] * m_pPos[ 3 * j + 1 ] ) / r2;
00633       I( 0, 2 ) += m_pMass[j] * ( -m_pPos[ 3 * j + 0 ] * m_pPos[ 3 * j + 2 ] ) / r2;
00634 
00635       I( 1, 0 ) += m_pMass[j] * ( -m_pPos[ 3 * j + 1 ] * m_pPos[ 3 * j + 0 ] ) / r2;
00636       I( 1, 1 ) += m_pMass[j] * (  m_pPos[ 3 * j + 0 ] * m_pPos[ 3 * j + 0 ] + m_pPos[ 3 * j + 2 ] * m_pPos[ 3 * j + 2 ] ) / r2;
00637       I( 1, 2 ) += m_pMass[j] * ( -m_pPos[ 3 * j + 1 ] * m_pPos[ 3 * j + 2 ] ) / r2;
00638 
00639       I( 2, 0 ) += m_pMass[j] * ( -m_pPos[ 3 * j + 2 ] * m_pPos[ 3 * j + 0 ] ) / r2;
00640       I( 2, 1 ) += m_pMass[j] * ( -m_pPos[ 3 * j + 2 ] * m_pPos[ 3 * j + 1 ] ) / r2;
00641       I( 2, 2 ) += m_pMass[j] * (  m_pPos[ 3 * j + 0 ] * m_pPos[ 3 * j + 0 ] + m_pPos[ 3 * j + 1 ] * m_pPos[ 3 * j + 1 ] ) / r2;
00642     }
00643   }
00644 
00645   I.Eigen( Eigenvalues, Eigenvectors );
00646 
00647   real la = Eigenvalues( 0 );
00648   real lb = Eigenvalues( 1 );
00649   real lc = Eigenvalues( 2 );
00650 
00651   Eigenvalues( 0 ) = sqrt( (5.0 / ( 2.0 * mtot )) * ( - la + lb + lc ) );
00652   Eigenvalues( 1 ) = sqrt( (5.0 / ( 2.0 * mtot )) * ( + la - lb + lc ) );
00653   Eigenvalues( 2 ) = sqrt( (5.0 / ( 2.0 * mtot )) * ( + la + lb - lc ) );
00654 }
00655 
00656 // computed relative to coordinate origin
00657 void 
00658 HaloProperties::ComputeShapeParameters( real& T, real& S ) const {
00659   Vector3 EW;
00660   std::vector<Vector3 > EV;
00661   ComputeMajorAxes( EW, EV );
00662 
00663   T = ( EW(0) * EW(0) - EW(1) * EW(1) ) / ( EW(0) * EW(0) - EW(2) * EW(2) );
00664   S = EW(2) / EW(0);
00665 }
00666 
00667 void 
00668 HaloProperties::ComputeVirialProperties200( real rhobox, real& Mvir, real& Rvir, real& Vcmax, std::vector<Distance> &dvec ) const {
00669   GetSortedDistances( dvec );
00670 
00671   real rhomean = 1.0e+99;
00672   unsigned ninside = 1;
00673   real R = 0.0;
00674   real pi43 = 4.0 * M_PI / 3.0;
00675   real fz =  m_Cosm.OmegaM0 / ( m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap ) /
00676     ( m_Cosm.OmegaM0 / ( m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap )
00677       + m_Cosm.OmegaL0 ) - 1.0;
00678 
00679   real rhocrit = rhobox / m_Cosm.OmegaM0 * m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap;
00680   // mean density / critical density (e.g. Bryan, Norman 1998)
00681   real delta = ( 18.0 * M_PI * M_PI + 82.0 * fz - 39.0 * fz * fz );
00682   real rhodelta = delta * rhocrit;
00683 
00684   real Vc;
00685   Vcmax = -1.0e+99;
00686 
00687 
00688   rhodelta = 200.0 * rhobox;
00689   //    std::cerr << "delta = " << rhodelta << ", overdens = " << rhodelta/rhobox << std::endl;
00690 
00691   real minside = 0.0;
00692 
00693   while ( rhomean > rhodelta && ninside < dvec.size() - 1 ) {
00694     R = m_Cosm.asnap * dvec[ ninside ].getr();
00695     minside += m_pMass[ dvec[ ninside ].geti() ];
00696     rhomean = minside / ( pi43 * R * R * R );
00697 
00698     Vc = minside / R;
00699     if ( Vc > Vcmax )
00700       Vcmax = Vc;
00701     ++ninside;
00702   }
00703 
00704   Vcmax = Vcmax * m_Cosm.G;
00705   Mvir = minside;
00706   Rvir = R;
00707 }
00708 
00709 void 
00710 HaloProperties::ComputeVirialProperties200( real rhobox, real& Mvir, real& Rvir, real &Vcmax ) const {
00711   std::vector<Distance> dvec;
00712   ComputeVirialProperties200( rhobox, Mvir, Rvir, Vcmax, dvec );
00713 }
00714 void 
00715 HaloProperties::ComputeVirialProperties200( real rhobox, real& Mvir, real& Rvir, std::vector<Distance> &dvec ) const {
00716   real Vcmax;
00717   ComputeVirialProperties200( rhobox, Mvir, Rvir, Vcmax, dvec );
00718 }
00719 void 
00720 HaloProperties::ComputeVirialProperties200( real rhobox, real& Mvir, real& Rvir ) const {
00721   std::vector<Distance> dvec;
00722   real Vcmax;
00723   ComputeVirialProperties200( rhobox, Mvir, Rvir, Vcmax, dvec );
00724 }
00725 
00726 
00727 void 
00728 HaloProperties::ComputeVirialProperties( real rhobox, real& Mvir, real& Rvir, real& Vcmax, std::vector<Distance> &dvec ) const {
00729   GetSortedDistances( dvec );
00730 
00731   real rhomean = 1.0e+99;
00732   unsigned ninside = 1;
00733   real R = 0.0;
00734   real pi43 = 4.0 * M_PI / 3.0;
00735   // real fz = m_Cosm.OmegaM0 / ( m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap ) / ( m_Cosm.OmegaM0 / ( m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap ) + m_Cosm.OmegaL0 ) - 1.0; // see below
00736   // real rhocrit = rhobox / m_Cosm.OmegaM0 * m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap; // see below
00737   // real delta = ( 18.0 * M_PI * M_PI + 82.0 * fz - 39.0 * fz * fz ); // see below
00738   // real rhodelta = delta * rhocrit; //used only if overdensity criterion is ON
00739 
00740   real Vc;
00741   Vcmax = -1.0e+99;
00742   real minside = 0.0;
00743 #warning Disabled checking for maximum radius based on overdensity criterion
00744   while ( /*rhomean > rhodelta &&*/ ninside < dvec.size() - 1 ) {
00745 
00746     R = m_Cosm.asnap * dvec[ ninside ].getr();
00747     minside += m_pMass[ dvec[ ninside ].geti() ];
00748     rhomean = minside / ( pi43 * R * R * R );
00749 
00750     Vc = minside / R;
00751     if ( Vc > Vcmax )
00752       Vcmax = Vc;
00753     ++ninside;
00754   }
00755 
00756   Vcmax = Vcmax * m_Cosm.G;
00757   Mvir = minside;
00758   Rvir = R;
00759 }
00760 void 
00761 HaloProperties::ComputeVirialProperties( real rhobox, real& Mvir, real& Rvir, std::vector<Distance> &dvec ) const {
00762   real Vcmax;
00763   ComputeVirialProperties( rhobox, Mvir, Rvir, Vcmax, dvec );
00764 }
00765 void 
00766 HaloProperties::ComputeVirialProperties( real rhobox, real& Mvir, real& Rvir, real& Vcmax ) const {
00767   std::vector<Distance> dvec;
00768   ComputeVirialProperties( rhobox, Mvir, Rvir, Vcmax, dvec );
00769 }
00770 void 
00771 HaloProperties::ComputeVirialProperties( real rhobox, real& Mvir, real& Rvir ) const {
00772   std::vector<Distance> dvec;
00773   real Vcmax;
00774   ComputeVirialProperties( rhobox, Mvir, Rvir, Vcmax, dvec );
00775 }
00776 
00777 real 
00778 HaloProperties::ComputePoormanConcentration( real rhobox, real &R20, real &R80 ) {
00779   std::vector<Distance> dvec;
00780   real Mvir, Rvir;
00781   ComputeVirialProperties( rhobox, Mvir, Rvir, dvec );
00782 
00783   R20 = dvec[ ( unsigned ) ( 0.2 * ( real ) dvec.size() + 0.5 ) ].getr() * m_Cosm.asnap;
00784   R80 = dvec[ ( unsigned ) ( 0.8 * ( real ) dvec.size() + 0.5 ) ].getr() * m_Cosm.asnap;
00785 
00786   return R80 / R20;
00787 }
00788 real 
00789 HaloProperties::ComputePoormanConcentration( real rhobox ) {
00790   real R20, R80;
00791   return ComputePoormanConcentration( rhobox, R20, R80 );
00792 }
00793 
00804 void 
00805 HaloProperties::ComputeLambdaPrime( real &lambda, real Mvir, real Rvir ) {
00806   std::vector<Distance> dvec;
00807   GetSortedDistances(dvec);
00808 
00809   Vector3 J = 0.0;
00810   Vector3 d = 0.0;
00811   Vector3 v = 0.0;
00812   unsigned ninside = 0;
00813   real minside = 0.0;
00814   real sqrta = sqrt( m_Cosm.asnap );
00815 
00816   //for( unsigned i=0; i<10 && i<m_nPart; ++i )
00817   //    std::cout << m_Cosm.asnap*(dvec[i].getr()) << " " << m_pPos[3*dvec[i].geti()] << " " << Rvir << " mass: "<< m_pMass[ dvec[ ninside ].geti() ] << std::endl;
00818   while ( ninside < m_nPart /*&& m_Cosm.asnap * dvec[ ninside ].getr() < Rvir*/) {
00819     //std::cout << ninside << std::endl;
00820     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00821       v( j ) = sqrta * m_pVel[ 3 * dvec[ ninside ].geti() + j ];
00822       d( j ) = m_Cosm.asnap * m_pPos[ 3 * dvec[ ninside ].geti() + j ];
00823     }
00824 
00825     //std::cout <<  m_pMass[ dvec[ ninside ].geti() ] << std::endl;
00826     J += (d^v)*m_pMass[ dvec[ ninside ].geti() ];
00827 
00828     minside += m_pMass[ dvec[ ninside ].geti() ];
00829     ++ninside;
00830   }
00831   std::cerr << " Mvir = " << Mvir << ", Rvir = " << Rvir << std::endl;
00832   assert( Mvir > 0.0 );
00833   assert( Rvir > 0.0 );
00834   if( ninside == 0 )
00835     lambda = -1.0;
00836 
00837   lambda = real( J.norm() / ( sqrt( 2.0 * m_Cosm.G * Rvir * Mvir ) * minside ) );
00838 }
00839 
00845 real 
00846 HaloProperties::ComputeKineticEnergy( std::vector<real>& kin ) const {
00847   real kintot = 0.0;
00848   real v[ 3 ];
00849 
00850   real Hza = m_Cosm.H0 * m_Cosm.asnap * sqrt( m_Cosm.OmegaM0 / ( m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap ) + m_Cosm.OmegaL0 );
00851   real sqrta = sqrt( m_Cosm.asnap );
00852 
00853   kin.clear();
00854 
00855   if ( m_pVel != NULL ) {
00856     for ( unsigned i = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i ) {
00857       real k = 0;
00858       for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00859     v[ j ] = sqrta * m_pVel[ 3 * i + j ] + Hza * m_pPos[ 3 * i + j ];
00860     k += v[ j ] * v[ j ];
00861       }
00862 
00863       k *= 0.5 * m_pMass[ i ];
00864 
00865       kin.push_back( ( real ) k );
00866       kintot += k;
00867     }
00868   } else {
00869     static bool bvelignore( false );
00870     if ( !bvelignore ) {
00871       std::cerr << " - Warning in HaloProperties::ComputeKineticEnergy" << std::endl;
00872       std::cerr << "     Setting kinetic energy to zero since I do not have velocities available!" << std::endl;
00873       bvelignore = true;
00874     }
00875     for ( unsigned i = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i )
00876       kin.push_back( 0.0 );
00877   }
00878   return real( kintot );
00879 }
00880 
00886 real 
00887 HaloProperties::ComputeKineticEnergyNoHubble( std::vector<real>& kin ) const {
00888   real kintot = 0.0;
00889   real v[ 3 ];
00890 
00891   real sqrta = sqrt( m_Cosm.asnap );
00892   kin.clear();
00893 
00894   // need for memory
00895   kin.reserve(m_nPart);
00896   if ( m_pVel != NULL ) {
00897     for ( unsigned i = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i ) {
00898       real k = 0;
00899       for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00900     v[ j ] = sqrta * m_pVel[ 3 * i + j ];
00901     k += v[ j ] * v[ j ];
00902       }
00903 
00904       k *= m_pMass[ i ] * 0.5;
00905 
00906       kin.push_back( real(k) );
00907       kintot += k;
00908     }
00909   } else {
00910     static bool bvelignore( false );
00911     if ( !bvelignore ) {
00912       std::cerr << " - Warning in HaloProperties::ComputeKineticEnergyNoHubble" << std::endl;
00913       std::cerr << "     Setting kinetic energy to zero since I do not have velocities available!" << std::endl;
00914       bvelignore = true;
00915     }
00916     kin.assign(m_nPart,0.0);
00917     //for ( unsigned i = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i )
00918     //kin.at( i ) = 0.0;
00919   }
00920   return real( kintot );
00921 }
00922 
00923 void 
00924 HaloProperties::ComputeKineticEnergyNoHubbleExc( std::vector<real>& kin, std::vector<bool> excluded ) const {
00925   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3 = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i, i3 = 3 * i ) {
00926     if ( excluded.at( i ) )
00927       kin.at(i) = 0.0;
00928     else
00929       kin.at( i ) = m_Cosm.asnap * ( m_pVel[ i3 + 0 ] * m_pVel[ i3 + 0 ] + m_pVel[ i3 + 1 ] * m_pVel[ i3 + 1 ] + m_pVel[ i3 + 2 ] * m_pVel[ i3 + 2 ] ) * m_pMass[ i ] / 2.0;
00930   }
00931 }
00932 
00939 real 
00940 HaloProperties::ComputePotentialDirect( real plumsoft, std::vector<real>& phi ) const {
00941   real phitot = 0.0;
00942   plumsoft *= m_Cosm.asnap;
00943 
00944   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3 = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i, i3 = 3 * i ) {
00945     //std::cout << "i = " << i << " of " << m_nPart << std::endl;
00946     real phii = 0.0;
00947     for ( unsigned j = i + 1, j3 = 0; j < m_nPart; ++j, j3 = 3 * j ) {
00948       //for ( unsigned j = 0; j < m_nPart; ++j ) {
00949       real
00950     dx = m_Cosm.asnap * ( m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ] - m_pPos[ j3 + 0 ] ),
00951     dy = m_Cosm.asnap * ( m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ] - m_pPos[ j3 + 1 ] ),
00952     dz = m_Cosm.asnap * ( m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ] - m_pPos[ j3 + 2 ] );
00953 
00954       real r2 = dx * dx + dy * dy + dz * dz;
00955       if ( j != i )
00956     phii += -m_Cosm.G * m_pMass[ i ] * m_pMass[ i ] / ( sqrt( r2 ) + plumsoft );
00957     }
00958 
00959     phi.push_back( ( real ) phii );
00960     phitot += phii;
00961   }
00962   return real( phitot );
00963 }
00964 
00965 void 
00966 HaloProperties::ComputePotentialDirectExc( real plumsoft, std::vector<real>& phi, std::vector<bool> excluded ) const {
00967   plumsoft *= m_Cosm.asnap;
00968 
00969   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3 = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i, i3 = 3 * i ) {
00970     //std::cout << "i = " << i << " of " << m_nPart << std::endl;
00971     //for all particles needed. so don't check for excluded here, but only for j
00972     // really???
00973     if( excluded.at(i) )
00974       continue;
00975     real dx = 0.0;
00976     real dy = 0.0;
00977     real dz = 0.0;
00978     real phii = 0.0;
00979 
00980     for ( unsigned j = 0, j3 = 0; j < m_nPart; ++j, j3 = 3 * j ) {
00981       if ( excluded.at( j ) )// || i == j )
00982     continue;
00983       j3 = 3 * j;
00984       dx = m_Cosm.asnap * ( m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ] - m_pPos[ j3 + 0 ] );
00985       dy = m_Cosm.asnap * ( m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ] - m_pPos[ j3 + 1 ] );
00986       dz = m_Cosm.asnap * ( m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ] - m_pPos[ j3 + 2 ] );
00987 
00988       phii += -m_Cosm.G * m_pMass[ i ] * m_pMass[ j ] / ( sqrt( dx * dx + dy * dy + dz * dz ) + plumsoft );
00989     }
00990     //std::cout << " phi(" << i << ") = " << phii << std::endl;
00991     phi.at( i ) = real( phii );
00992   }
00993 }
00994 real 
00995 HaloProperties::ComputePotentialTree( real theta, real plumsoft, std::vector<real>& phi ) const {
00996   // 0.7, 0,
00997   phi.clear();
00998   plumsoft *= m_Cosm.asnap;
00999 
01000   real phitot = 0.0;
01001 
01002   std::vector< PseudoBody > barray;
01003 
01004   real xmin = 1.0e+99; //real xmax = -1.0e+99;
01005   real ymin = 1.0e+99; //real ymax = -1.0e+99;
01006   real zmin = 1.0e+99; //real zmax = -1.0e+99;
01007 
01008   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3 = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i, i3 = 3 * i ) {
01009     xmin = ( m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ] < xmin ) ? m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ] : xmin;
01010     //xmax = ( m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ] > xmax ) ? m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ] : xmax;
01011     ymin = ( m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ] < ymin ) ? m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ] : ymin;
01012     //ymax = ( m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ] > ymax ) ? m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ] : ymax;
01013     zmin = ( m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ] < zmin ) ? m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ] : zmin;
01014     //zmax = ( m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ] > zmax ) ? m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ] : zmax;
01015   }
01016 
01017   real x, y, z;
01018   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3 = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i, i3 = 3 * i ) {
01019     x = m_Cosm.asnap * ( m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ] - xmin );
01020     y = m_Cosm.asnap * ( m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ] - ymin );
01021     z = m_Cosm.asnap * ( m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ] - zmin );
01022 
01023     barray.push_back( PseudoBody( m_pMass[ i ], x, y, z ) );
01024   }
01025 
01026   //real length = std::max( std::max(xmax-xmin,ymax-ymin),zmax-zmin );
01027 
01028   //#ifndef OCTTREE
01029   //    kDTreeNode *BHroot = new kDTreeNode( barray );
01030   //#else
01031   OctTreeNode *BHroot = new OctTreeNode( barray, plumsoft ); //, length );
01032   //#endif
01033 
01034 
01035   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i ) {
01036     real phii = m_Cosm.G * m_pMass[ i ] * BHroot->traverse( barray[ i ].getx(),
01037                                 barray[ i ].gety(),
01038                                 barray[ i ].getz(),
01039                                 theta, plumsoft );
01040     phitot += phii;
01041     phi.push_back( real( phii ) );
01042   }
01043 
01044   delete BHroot;
01045 
01046   return 0.5*phitot;
01047 }
01048 void 
01049 HaloProperties::ComputePotentialTreeExc( real theta, real plumsoft, std::vector<real>& phi, std::vector<bool> excluded ) const {
01050   plumsoft *= m_Cosm.asnap;
01051 
01052   std::vector< PseudoBody > barray;
01053 
01054   real xmin = 1.0e+99; //real xmax = -1.0e+99;
01055   real ymin = 1.0e+99; //real ymax = -1.0e+99;
01056   real zmin = 1.0e+99; //real zmax = -1.0e+99;
01057 
01058   // recenter all particles to minima of coordinates
01059   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3 = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i, i3 = 3 * i ) {
01060     xmin = ( m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ] < xmin ) ? m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ] : xmin;
01061     //xmax = ( m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ] > xmax ) ? m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ] : xmax;
01062     ymin = ( m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ] < ymin ) ? m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ] : ymin;
01063     //ymax = ( m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ] > ymax ) ? m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ] : ymax;
01064     zmin = ( m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ] < zmin ) ? m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ] : zmin;
01065     //zmax = ( m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ] > zmax ) ? m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ] : zmax;
01066   }
01067 
01068   // write masses and positions into tree
01069   real x, y, z;
01070   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3 = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i, i3 = 3 * i ) {
01071     x = m_Cosm.asnap * ( m_pPos[ i3 + 0 ] - xmin );
01072     y = m_Cosm.asnap * ( m_pPos[ i3 + 1 ] - ymin );
01073     z = m_Cosm.asnap * ( m_pPos[ i3 + 2 ] - zmin );
01074     if ( excluded.at( i ) )
01075       barray.push_back( PseudoBody( 0.0, x, y, z ) );
01076     else
01077       barray.push_back( PseudoBody( m_pMass[ i ], x, y, z ) );
01078   }
01079 
01080   //#ifndef OCTTREE
01081   //    kDTreeNode *BHroot = new kDTreeNode( barray );
01082   //#else
01083   OctTreeNode *BHroot = new OctTreeNode( barray, plumsoft ); //, length );
01084   //#endif
01085 
01086   // compute potential for all particles
01087   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i ) {
01088     real phii = m_Cosm.G * m_pMass[ i ] * BHroot->traverse( barray[ i ].getx(),
01089                                 barray[ i ].gety(),
01090                                 barray[ i ].getz(),
01091                                 theta, plumsoft );
01092     phi.at( i ) = real( phii );
01093   }
01094   delete BHroot;
01095 }
01096 
01097 std::vector<bool> 
01098 HaloProperties::CleanUnbound( real boxsize ) {
01099   std::vector<bool> excluded( m_nPart );
01100   CleanUnboundExc( boxsize, excluded );
01101 
01102   return excluded;
01103 }
01104 
01105 void 
01106 HaloProperties::CleanUnboundExc( real boxsize, std::vector<bool>& excluded ) {
01107   //std::cout << "Cleanup started with " << m_nPart << " particles...";
01108   //std::cout.flush();
01109 
01110   unsigned pc = 0;
01111   for ( unsigned j = 0; j < m_nPart; ++j ) {
01112     if ( m_nPart > 1000 && j % 10 == 1 )
01113       std::cout << "j = " << j << std::endl;
01114     std::vector<real> phi( m_nPart );
01115     std::vector<real> kin( m_nPart );
01116 
01117     //std::cout << "Centering particles...";
01118     CenterOnCMExc( boxsize, excluded );
01119     //std::cout << "and velocities...";
01120     CenterVelExc( excluded );
01121     //std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
01122 
01123     //ComputePotentialDirectExc( 0.0, phi, excluded );
01124     //ComputePotentialTreeExc( theta, plumsoft, phi );
01125     // theta gives "angle" to leaves
01126     real theta = 0.7;
01127     ComputePotentialTreeExc( theta, 1.0, phi, excluded );
01128     //std::cout << "potential computed" << std::endl;
01129     ComputeKineticEnergyNoHubbleExc( kin, excluded );
01130     //std::cout << "kinetic energy computed" << std::endl;
01131 
01132     real emax = -1E99;
01133     int maxpos = -1;
01134     //get most unbound particle
01135     for ( unsigned i = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i ) {
01136       if ( excluded.at( i ) )
01137     continue;
01138       //std::cout << "kin[" << i << "]=" << kin[ i ] << ", phi[" << i << "]=" << phi[ i ] << std::endl;
01139 
01140       if ( phi[ i ] + kin[ i ] < emax )
01141     continue;
01142       maxpos = i;
01143       //std::cout << "maxpos = " << maxpos << std::endl;
01144 
01145       emax = phi[ i ] + kin[ i ];
01146     }
01147 
01148     if ( emax < 0 || pc + 1 == m_nPart ) {
01149       // std::cout << "no more unbound particles found" << std::endl;
01150       break;
01151     } else {
01152       //std::cout << "removing particle " << maxpos << " from list..." << std::endl;
01153       excluded.at( maxpos ) = true;
01154       ++pc;
01155     }
01156 
01157     // reinclude bound particles that were excluded previously
01158     for ( unsigned i = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i ) {
01159       if ( excluded.at( i ) && phi[ i ] + kin[ i ] < 0 ) {
01160     excluded.at( i ) = false;
01161     --pc;
01162     std::cout << i << " is bound again..." << std::endl;
01163       }
01164     }
01165   }
01166   std::cout << "    Removed " << pc << " out of " << m_nPart << " particles." << std::endl;
01167 }
01168 
01169 void 
01170 HaloProperties::CleanUnboundSimple( real boxsize, std::vector<bool>& excluded ) {
01171   int pc = 0;
01172   std::vector<real> phi( m_nPart );
01173   std::vector<real> kin( m_nPart );
01174 
01175   //std::cout << "Centering particles...";
01176   CenterOnCM( boxsize );
01177   //std::cout << "and velocities...";
01178   CenterVel( );
01179   //std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
01180 
01181   ComputePotentialDirectExc( 0.0, phi, excluded );
01182   //std::cout << "potential computed" << std::endl;
01183   ComputeKineticEnergyNoHubbleExc( kin, excluded );
01184   //std::cout << "kinetic energy computed" << std::endl;
01185   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < m_nPart; ++i ) {
01186     if ( phi[ i ] + kin[ i ] > 0 ) {
01187       //std::cout << "removing particle " << maxpos << " from list..." << std::endl;
01188       excluded.at( i ) = true;
01189       ++pc;
01190     }
01191   }
01192   std::cout << " * * S:Removed " << pc << " out of " << m_nPart << " particles." << std::endl;
01193 }

01200 #if 1
01201 int 
01202 HaloProperties::ComputeDensityProfile( real rhobox, unsigned n,
01203                        std::vector<real>& r,
01204                        std::vector<real>& rho,
01205                        std::vector<real>& sigma_rho ) const {
01206   std::vector<real> rr;
01207   real Mvir, Rvir;
01208   rho.clear();
01209   std::vector<Distance> dvec;
01210   ComputeVirialProperties( rhobox, Mvir, Rvir, dvec );
01211 
01212   if ( dvec.size() < 50 ) {
01213     std::cerr << "not enough particles. npart=" << m_nPart << std::endl;
01214     std::cerr << "dvec.size() = " << dvec.size() << std::endl;
01215 
01216     return 0;
01217   }
01218 
01219   // hmm. either - or?
01220   unsigned nn = unsigned( ( real ) dvec.size() / ( n + 1.0 ) );
01221   nn = unsigned( ( real ) dvec.size() / n );
01222 
01223   std::vector<real> m, dV;
01224   std::vector<unsigned> nshell;
01225 
01226 
01227   for ( unsigned i = 1;i < n + 1; ++i ) {
01228     rr.push_back( dvec[ nn * i ].getr() * m_Cosm.asnap );
01229     m.push_back( nn * m_pMass[ i ] );
01230     nshell.push_back( nn );
01231   }
01232 
01233 
01234   dV.push_back( 4.0 * M_PI / 3.0 * rr[ 0 ] * rr[ 0 ] * rr[ 0 ] );
01235   for ( unsigned i = 1; i < n; ++i )
01236     dV.push_back( 4.0 * M_PI / 3.0 * ( rr[ i ] * rr[ i ] * rr[ i ] - rr[ i - 1 ] * rr[ i - 1 ] * rr[ i - 1 ] ) );
01237 
01238   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < n; ++i ) {
01239     real rhonext = m[ i ] / ( dV[ i ] * m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap );
01240     if ( i > 1 && rhonext > 1.25 * rho[ i - 1 ] )
01241       break;
01242 
01243     rho.push_back( rhonext );
01244     sigma_rho.push_back( rhonext / sqrt( nshell[ i ] ) );
01245     r.push_back( rr[ i ] );
01246 
01247   }
01248 
01249   return 1;
01250 }
01251 #else // now 0
01252 int 
01253 HaloProperties::ComputeDensityProfile( real rhobox, unsigned n,
01254                        std::vector<real>& r,
01255                        std::vector<real>& rho,
01256                        std::vector<real>& sigma_rho ) const {
01257   std::vector<real> rr;
01258   real Mvir, Rvir;
01259   rho.clear();
01260   std::vector<Distance> dvec;
01261   ComputeVirialProperties( rhobox, Mvir, Rvir, dvec );
01262 
01263   if ( dvec.size() < 50 ) {
01264     std::cerr << " - not enough particles. npart=" << m_nPart << std::endl;
01265     std::cerr << "     dvec.size() = " << dvec.size() << std::endl;
01266     abort();
01267   }
01268 
01269   logspace( log10( dvec[ 50 ].getr() ), log10( Rvir / m_Cosm.asnap ), n, rr );
01270 
01271   if ( dvec[ 50 ].getr() > Rvir / m_Cosm.asnap ) {
01272     std::cerr << "  Found strange profile, will skip this step." << std::endl;
01273     return 0;
01274   }
01275 
01276   std::vector<real> m;
01277   std::vector<real> dV;
01278   std::vector<unsigned> nshell;
01279   m.assign( n, 0.0 );
01280   nshell.assign( n, 0 );
01281 
01282   real Rvirp = ( 1.0 + 1.0e-6 ) * Rvir;
01283 
01284   unsigned ishell = 0, ninside = 0;
01285   while ( dvec[ ninside ].getr() <= Rvirp && ninside < m_nPart ) {
01286     if ( dvec[ ninside ].getr() > rr[ ishell ] )
01287       ++ishell;
01288     m[ ishell ] += m_pMass[ ninside ];
01289     ++nshell[ ishell ];
01290     ++ninside;
01291   }
01292 
01293   dV.push_back( 4.0 * M_PI / 3.0 * rr[ 0 ] * rr[ 0 ] * rr[ 0 ] );
01294   for ( unsigned i = 1; i < n; ++i )
01295     dV.push_back( 4.0 * M_PI / 3.0 * ( rr[ i ] * rr[ i ] * rr[ i ] - rr[ i - 1 ] * rr[ i - 1 ] * rr[ i - 1 ] ) );
01296 
01297   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < n; ++i ) {
01298     real rhonext = m[ i ] / ( dV[ i ] * m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap * m_Cosm.asnap );
01299     if ( i > 0 && rhonext > 1.1 * rho[ i - 1 ] )
01300       break;
01301 
01302     rho.push_back( rhonext );
01303     sigma_rho.push_back( rho[ i ] / sqrt( nshell[ i ] ) );
01304     r.push_back( rr[ i ] );
01305 
01306 
01307   }
01308 
01309   if ( r.size() < n / 2 )
01310     return 0;
01311 
01312   return 1;
01313 }
01314 #endif
01315 
01316 int 
01317 HaloProperties::FitNFWProfile2( real rhobox, unsigned n, real& fdeltac, real& fedeltac, real& frs, real& fers ) const {
01318   std::vector<real> r, rho, erho;
01319   real dc0, rs0, dc, edc, rs, ers;
01320 
01321   if ( !ComputeDensityProfile( rhobox, n, r, rho, erho ) ) {
01322     std::cerr << " - no convergence in FitNFW!" << std::endl;
01323     return 0;
01324   }
01325 
01326   dc0 = rho[ 0 ] * 10.0;
01327   rs0 = r[ r.size() - 1 ] * 0.1;
01328   NFW_fit( r, 
01329        rho, 
01330        erho, 
01331        dc0, 
01332        rs0, 
01333        dc, 
01334        edc,
01335        rs,
01336        ers );
01337 
01338   fdeltac = dc;
01339   frs = rs;
01340 
01341   return 1;
01342 }
01343 
01344 int 
01345 HaloProperties::FitNFWProfile1( real rhobox, unsigned n, real& frs, real& fers ) const {
01346   std::vector<real> r, rho, erho;
01347   real rs0;
01348   real rs;
01349   real ers;
01350   real mvir;
01351   real rvir;
01352 
01353   ComputeVirialProperties( rhobox, mvir, rvir );
01354 
01355   if ( !ComputeDensityProfile( rhobox, n, r, rho, erho ) ) {
01356     std::cerr << " - no convergence in FitNFW!" << std::endl;
01357     return 0;
01358   }
01359 
01360   rs0 = r[ r.size() - 1 ] * 0.1;
01361   NFW_fix_fit( r, rho, erho, rvir, mvir, rs0, rs, ers );
01362 
01363   frs = rs;
01364 
01365   return 1;
01366 }
